DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE `SYS_INTERFACE_LOG` MODIFY COLUMN `FILENAME` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `WORKSTATION_ID`;
ALTER TABLE `SYS_INTERFACE_REQUEST` MODIFY COLUMN `FILENAME` varchar(252) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `STATUS`;
